lead_paragraph: Tests show that some types of laminate flooring sold by Lumber Liquidators can cause irritation and breathing problems but the risk of cancer from exposure is low.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Laminate Causes Problems, but Cancer Risk Is Called Low
headline.main: Laminate Causes Problems, but Cancer Risk Is Called Low

snippet: Tests show that some types of laminate flooring sold by Lumber Liquidators can cause irritation and breathing problems but the risk of cancer from exposure is low.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says tests have shown that some laminate flooring sold by Lumber Liquidators can lead to irritation and problems breathing, but that risk of cancer from exposure to such flooring, which was found to have formaldehyde, is low.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
